oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various record and radio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various recordings of performances featuring R. Thompson (performer), J.J. Garrett (performer), V. Clements (performer), and Don Thorpe (performer), according to case label. These performers are featured on a disc recorded in Germany. Tape also features Roy Acuff (performer), Roy Duke (performer), Pete Pyle (performer), Clyde Moody (performer), Eddy Arnold (performer), Ernest Tubb (performer). All of these performances are from various dates, radio programs, and records.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Roy Duke; Pete Pyle; Clyde Moody; Eddy Arnold; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Stealing The Blues (various) -- Black Mountain Rag (various) -- Great Speckled Bird (Roy Acuff) (incomplete) -- There Will Be A Bright Star After Every Dark Cloud (Roy Duke) [unconfirmed] -- You Wake Up Too Late (Roy Duke) [unconfirmed] -- Pete Pyle talks -- You've Broken Your Promise (Pete Pyle) -- [Unidentified talks] -- [Unidentified audio of train imitations] -- Mississippi River Blues (Clyde Moody) -- Meeting In The Air (Roy Acuff) (incomplete) -- Call On Me And Darling I'll Be There (Eddy Arnold) (incomplete) [unconfirmed] -- Born To Lose (Ernest Tubb)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Acuff, Roy, 1903-1992; Duke, Roy; Pyle, Pete; Moody, Clyde, 1915-1989; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984;
